alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 24 at 5:09PM MDT until June 24 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central South Dakota, including the following counties, Mellette and Todd. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 606 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Horse Creek, White Thunder Creek, Antelope Creek, Oak Creek, Little Oak Creek, and Horse Head Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mission and northeastern Rosebud Reservation.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
